We need a loving, open space for a weekly group.Trade for our services (Boulder)

(google map) (yahoo map)

Hi! We're Kendra and Chris. We co-create dating events, workshops, and talks for our community of people who want a funner, more heart-centered, deeper way of connecting and attracting love. We absolutely LOVE what we do and want to continue spreading more love in the world. Our next offering will be a weekly supportive group called the Dating Detox series. The group will center around various topics related to dating: after divorce, after break-ups, loneliness, social anxiety, awkwardness, and so on.

We teach specific processes that aim to address the most common issues that come up for people when it comes to dating. Our approach is very body, movement, and mindfulness based.

Do you have a loving, cozy space that can hold 10-12 people on a weekly PM basis?

We will trade you our one-on-one dating coaching, attendance at the group, or anything else we might be able to figure out together.

Check out our website and email us if this sounds interesting to you!
Evolve Dating Gurus . com

Thanks a lot!
K+C
